body:
Apache 2 is fine for me

On Fri, Nov 8, 2019, 10:13 AM Donald McIntyre <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> I will add in my table all those who asked for "public domain" (@zmitton
> <https://github.com/zmitton> @soc1c <https://github.com/soc1c> @cseberino
> <https://github.com/cseberino> ) as CC0.
>
> All who consented to Apache 2.0 will do correspondingly.
>
> Hi @cseberino <https://github.com/cseberino>, just to clarify, are yours
> CC-BY-SA-4.0? (that is also acceptable in ECIP-1000)
>
> Then I will update their corresponding ECIPs putting the selected license
> in the "meta" section and in the footer.
>
